title: Mayor Durkan signs Mandatory Housing Affordability into law
description:
Joined by affordable housing advocates and other community members, Seattle Mayor Jenny A. Durkan signed into law the ordinance to implement Mandatory Housing Affordability (MHA) in Seattle's 27 urban villages and all other commercial and multifamily residential areas.

Speakers:
Jenny A. Durkan, Mayor, City of Seattle
Christopher Persons, CEO, Capitol Hill Housing
Rob Johnson, Councilmember, City of Seattle
Faith Pettis, Co-chair, HALA Committee
Marty Kooistra, Executive Director, Housing Development Consortium
Albert Zakharenko, Resident, 12th Avenue Arts
